name: Omegga-Discord
description: This plugin provides a highly configurable interface between a Brickadia server and a discord server.
author: technologenesis

token.description: The authorization token for the bot to use

enable-godspeak-for-mods.description: Should messages in mod channel be relayed to in-game chat?

enable-godspeak-for-users.description: Should messages in chat channel be relayed to in-game chat?

enable-console-logs.description: Should console logs be sent to the log channel?

enable-chat-logs.description: Should chat logs be sent to the chat channel?

enable-player-verification.description: Allow players to verify their Discord accounts?

change-nick-on-verify.description: Change Discord nicknames to in-game names on verification?

enable-tracking-ingame-players.description: Use a role to show which verified players are online?

log-game-events.description: Log game events along with chat?

guild-id.description: The ID of the Discord server

mod-channel-id.description: The ID of the channel to post mod messages to

log-channel-id.description: The ID of the channel to post console logs to, and to read console commands from

mod-tag-id.description: The ID of the user or role to be tagged in reports

chat-channel-id.description: The ID of the channel to post chat logs to

ingame-role.description: What role to use for marking in-game players

verify-role-id.description: The role to assign users when they are verified

verify-timeout.description: Allotted time to verify after receiving a code

commands.name: /report
commands.description: submits a report to the moderator

commands.name: /verify
commands.description: Get a verification code to verify a Discord accout

commands.name: /whois
commands.description: Get the verified discord user associated with a player
